Choose the right answer . Kies het juiste antwoord . Choisissez la bonne reponse . SHELL PROFITS ALMOST DOUBLE The oil giant SHELL reports that its second-quarter profits have almost doubled after having completed a year-long corporate restructuring programme . The firm indicated profits of $ 4.5bn on a current cost of supplies basis , up from $ 2.3bn a year ago . This however was a drop from the $ 5.2 bn it made in the first three months of the year as it saw `` mixed signals '' in the world economy . Earlier this month , rival BP reported a record $ 17bn loss , which included a provision to cover the costs of its oil spill disaster in the China Sea . What is a synonym for `` drop '' ?

Choose the right answer . Kies het juiste antwoord . Choisissez la bonne reponse . BOJING PROFITS SLUMP BY A FIFTH AS DELIVERIES FALL Plane deliveries by aircraft giant Bojing have been late , and this resulted in a sharp drop in profits between April and June . Net profit for the quarter was $ 786m , higher than analysts had expected but down 21 % on the $ 988m the company made in the same period a year ago . Although the group revenue fell to $ 15.7bn from $ 17.3bn a year earlier , it said its commercial markets were recovering and it remained `` well positioned for growth in 2011 and beyond '' . What is a synonym for `` recover '' ?
